summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing deposits, withdrawals, and transfers during September 2017. It includes specific transactions involving large sums of money transferred to various entities and individuals.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as the recipient of a significant outgoing money transfer from the account.

persons.name: Darren K Indyke
persons.context: Darren K Indyke is mentioned as another recipient of a large outgoing money transfer from the account.

connections.description: Both individuals are recipients of large outgoing transfers from the same account.

events.title: Account Summary for September 2017
events.description: The document summarizes the account balance and transactions for the month of September 2017.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to PNC Bank
events.description: A transfer of $698.00 was made to PNC Bank.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to Richard Kahn
events.description: A transfer of $475,000.00 was made to Richard Kahn.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to Darren K Indyke
events.description: A transfer of $475,000.00 was made to Darren K Indyke.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands, U.S.
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for September 2017.
Stewart Oldfield is the contact person for account inquiries.
Significant outgoing transfers of $475,000.00 each were made to Richard Kahn and Darren K Indyke.
The account had a beginning balance of $963,187.55 and ended with a balance of $12,489.55.
There are multiple outgoing transfers listed, including one to PNC Bank for $698.00.
